subject: Attention Please,
body:
Attention Please,
This to inform you that we have received instruction with your funds
file from office of the presidency to transfer your inheritance
funds of $90,000.000.00 dollars to your bank account today
as soon as all charges is deducted.
Please re-confirm your bank information to avoid any mistake during
The transfer today. We are going to transfer your inheritance
funds of$90,000.000.00 dollars to your bank account today
And the transfer confirmation slips will be sent to you for your easy
Confirmation.
As a matter of urgency you are advised to make a payment of us$50.00
Been payment of deduction fee.
The deduction fee of us$50.00 will enable this bank to obtain an
Affidavit and stamp duties from high court of Ottawa, on, Canada,
which will empower us to deduct all charges and prepare your deduction
Certificate that will show that all charges have been deducted and you
Will not pay any other fee.
You advised to send the deduction fee of us$50.00 today through iTunes
Gift card or steam gift card or Apple gift card or Bitcoin wallet
As soon as we receive this payment from you today, we will deduct all
Charges and your balance will be remitted to your account today
Morning and the transfer details will be forwarded to you for your
Easy confirmation with your bank.
Act according to the instructions, I am waiting for your urgent response.
Note: make sure you regards and god bless you.
Yours faithfully
Mr. Thomas Stanley
foreign operation department
for: Canada Development royal bank of Canada

subject: Re: Attention Please,
body:
Hello Mr. Thomas Stanley,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer of my funds. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with any payments.

1. Can you please provide more details about the charges that need to be deducted? What are these charges for?

2. Why is an affidavit and stamp duties required from the high court of Ottawa, Canada? How does this process work?

3. Is there any specific reason why payment needs to be made through gift cards or Bitcoin wallet? Are there alternative payment methods available?

I look forward to your prompt response and clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
John
